project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Develop a Python-based quiz game that prompts the user with multiple-choice questions, tracks the user's score, and displays it at the end. Questions and answers will be stored as variables within the code.

task.name: Design the structure for the quiz game including question and answer storage
Implement functionality to display questions to the user
Implement functionality to gather user input for answers
Implement score tracking based on user answers
Implement functionality to display the final score at the end of the quiz
Write tests to verify the functionality of question display, answer input, score tracking, and final score output
Execute tests on all implemented functionalities to ensure correctness
